Posts.Content: Oct 18, 2007 11:32PM raiken wrote: Hi Michele, I am so very sorry that you are going through this ordeal.  You are such a strong person to be able to ask other people for help.  My future mother-in-law was just told that she has lesions on her brain, and started radiation therapy today.  Her doctor seems very optimistic, and I am praying for a speedy recovery.  She, too, is a very strong woman.  I will keep you in my prayers as well. ERA
